700939f-a.title: Bronx: Tremont Avenue (East - Paulding Avenue
700939f-a.text:
E. Tremont Avenue, north side, east from Paulding
to Lurting Avenues. The outdoor advertising signs are
at the N. E. corner of E. Tremont and Paulding Avenues;
the 5-story apartment house, at the N. E. corner of Hone
Avenue.
June 22, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
700939f-a.folder: Tremont Avenue (East & Paulding Avenue, Bronx, NY
